subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Second-half goals by Abby Wambach, Shannon Boxx and Kristine Lilly carried the United States into the semifinals of the Women’s World Cup with a 3-0 victory yesterday over England in Tianjin, China.
snippet: Second-half goals by Abby Wambach, Shannon Boxx and Kristine Lilly carried the United States into the semifinals of the Women’s World Cup with a 3-0 victory yesterday over England in Tianjin, China.
